attributes.action: Stop Blair from resurrecting the EU Constitution, we dont want it
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Tony Blair has NO RIGHT to sign anything regarding the EU Constitution, it has been scrapped and he should not be allowed to agree anything that replaces it without us the voters having a referendum!! He has ruined our country as it is, it is time to say no more!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
